duties_responsibilities.duty: Successfully deliver construction projects or sections within budget, on time, and in compliance with client specifications.
Create a 'Knowingly Safe' working environment, ensuring compliance with health and safety principles and regulations.
Engage with stakeholders to ensure safe, buildable, and timely designs for efficient project delivery.
Manage risk and opportunities, investigate incidents, and take ownership for the quality of work and delivery standards.
Champion the use of innovative technologies and techniques, manage the construction teams, and ensure adequate resources are available.
Support the project team in stakeholder communication, community engagement, and delivery of commitments.
